caption: Two women engage in a conversation. After several flashes of colored light, the women change their clothes. A man is bound to a sandbag. Another person approaches and starts playing a record on a gramophone. He stands by the window. Suddenly, he turns and strikes the sandbag forcefully. At this moment, another peculiar-looking individual jumps down from the room's beams. They remove their mask and converse with the boy tied to the sandbag. A mysterious figure takes off into the sky, soaring high. A person, holding a book, starts to doze off. Suddenly, they notice a woman outside emitting various colors of light. The scene transitions to a person dancing among the city buildings. A giant spider appears in the visuals.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like an animated movie.
